items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t possibly have known that Mary was the one who got him fired.
I\'m sure that Tom won\'t be able to understand what we\'re talking about.
Tom used to always wear a watch, but now he just looks at his smart phone.
Would you have some time on Monday to come over and help me move my piano?
Tom not only denied that he was Mary\'s friend, but that he even knew her.
When I entered the room, Tom and Mary were snuggled together on the couch.
Tom doesn\'t want to open the box, but he wants to know what\'s inside it.
Tom got tired of waiting for Mary, so he went into the museum without her.
How confident are you that they\'ll get these repairs completed by Monday?
Tom hasn\'t seen Mary more than five or six time in the past twelve years.
I should be studying French, but it\'s more fun hanging out with you guys.
Tom would probably be disappointed if we didn\'t go to his birthday party.
If Tom had been speaking French, I would have been able to understand him.
Tom agrees that Mary should do most of the driving on their upcoming trip.
Tom always seems to be very busy and doesn\'t seem to have much free time.
I still think it\'s unlikely that we\'ll ever find someone to replace Tom.
What is important is seldom urgent and what is urgent is seldom important.
Mary isn\'t as beautiful as her sister, but she\'s still quite attractive.
I\'d like to go through just one day without being told I need to grow up.
Tom said he didn\'t know that Mary wasn\'t able to speak French very well.
